articles.title: Russia’s Putin says ‘radical Islamists’ behind Moscow concert hall attack - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Russian leader also suggests Ukraine is somehow involved in the attack without providing any evidence.
articles.content:
Russian President Vladimir Putin says for the first time that radical Islamists were behind last weeks attack on a concert hall outside Moscow but suggests Ukraine was also somehow involved.

articles.title: 'The headset helps my depression so I can be a dad again' - BBC.com
articles.description: Ashley Riley says he can be a full-time father again after using an electric headset to treat depression.
